title: Ticket #4327: Startd crashes on reconfig if NUM_SLOTS=0
description: When the startd is configured to have no resources (i.e. if NUM_SLOTS=0), the ResMgr class doesn't create a StartdHookMgr object. But on a reconfig, it always attempts to call StartdHookMgr::reconfig(), which will then cause a seg-fault.
